thread.title: Germany's Merkel to talk to May on Tuesday - lawmakers

title: Germany's Merkel to talk to May on Tuesday - lawmakers
text: March 13, 2018 / 3:16 PM / Updated 38 minutes ago Germany's Merkel to talk to May on Tuesday - lawmakers Reuters Staff 1 Min Read BERLIN (Reuters) - Germanyâ€™s Angela Merkel will talk to British Prime Minister Theresa May later on Tuesday, several German lawmakers from her conservative bloc said after a meeting with the chancellor. German Chancellor Angela Merkel and Britain's Prime Minister Theresa May after a news conference in Berlin, Germany, February 16, 2018. REUTERS/Hannibal Hanschke They did not give any details about what the pair would discuss. Earlier on Tuesday, German Foreign Minister Sigmar Gabriel condemned a nerve agent attack in England on a former spy that the British government has blamed on Russia, and said the perpetrators must be held accountable. Reporting by Andreas Rinke; Writing by Michelle Martin; Editing by Paul Carrel
